org.opends.quicksetup.util

Interface ProgressMessageFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlProgressMessageFormatter, PlainTextProgressMessageFormatter

    public interface ProgressMessageFormatter
    This interface has been created in order to share the same formatting code for both the Installer and the Uninstaller classes. This way we have the same look and feel for both. In addition to that not having the format of the message inside the Installer/Uninstaller classes is cleaner, as these classes should no nothing about the classes that are in charge of displaying the progress.

      • getFormattedWithPoints

        org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage getFormattedWithPoints(org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage text)
        Returns the formatted representation of the argument text to which we add points. For instance if we pass as argument 'Configuring Server' the return value will be 'Configuring Server .....'.
        Parameters:
        text - the String to which add points.
        Returns:
        the formatted representation of the '.....' text string.

      • getFormattedError

        org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage getFormattedError(Throwable t,
                                                        boolean applyMargin)
        Returns the formatted representation of an error message for a given throwable. This method applies a margin if the applyMargin parameter is true.
        Parameters:
        t - the throwable.
        applyMargin - specifies whether we apply a margin or not to the resulting formatted text.
        Returns:
        the formatted representation of an error message for the given exception.

        Parameters:
